SEARCH:
Package virusvoid.logic.other

Klasse TutorialAndGameHelper

java.lang.Object
virusvoid.logic.other.TutorialAndGameHelper
public class TutorialAndGameHelper extends Object
Helper class for managing various aspects of the game and tutorial.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • TutorialAndGameHelper

      public TutorialAndGameHelper()

  • Methodendetails

    • startManagers

      public static void startManagers()
      Starts the necessary managers for the game and tutorial.

    • moveAndSpawnPlayerProjectiles

      public static void moveAndSpawnPlayerProjectiles(TimeManager playerProjectileSpawnTimeManager, TimeManager playerProjectileMoveTimeManager)
      Moves and spawns player projectiles based on the given time managers.
      Parameter:
      playerProjectileSpawnTimeManager - The time manager for spawning player projectiles.
      playerProjectileMoveTimeManager - The time manager for moving player projectiles.

    • animateExplosion

      public static void animateExplosion(GameObject gameObject, char explosionFrameType, int waitTime, int maxLoopRotations, int timeUpdateRate)
      Animates an explosion for the given game object.
      Parameter:
      gameObject - The game object for which the explosion is animated.
      explosionFrameType - The type of explosion frame to use ('E' = Enemy, 'B' = Boss, 'S' = Spaceship).
      waitTime - The duration to wait between animation frames.
      maxLoopRotations - The time between each loop rotation.
      timeUpdateRate - The rate at which to update the elapsed time.

    • waitAndCheckForPause

      public static void waitAndCheckForPause(long waitTime, int maxLoopRotations, int timeUpdateRate, BooleanSupplier runningCondition, BooleanSupplier pausedCondition)
      Waits for a specified duration while checking for game or tutorial pause conditions.
      Parameter:
      waitTime - The duration to wait.
      maxLoopRotations - The time between each loop rotation.
      timeUpdateRate - The rate at which to update the time.
      runningCondition - The condition for the game or tutorial to be running.
      pausedCondition - The condition for the game or tutorial to be paused.

    • setGamePaused

      public static void setGamePaused(AtomicBoolean levelOrWaveAnnouncement, AtomicBoolean paused)
      Sets the game to a paused or unpaused state. If the game is paused, it also manages UI elements accordingly.
      Parameter:
      levelOrWaveAnnouncement - Indicates if a level or wave announcement is active
      paused - Indicates if the (infinite) game is paused

    • removeProjectilesAndAnimations

      public static void removeProjectilesAndAnimations()
      Removes all projectiles and explosion animations from the game. This method is called when transitioning between levels or when the game ends.
